title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us       Fantastic career opportunities abound at Bryce Canyon National Park. Beautiful and amazing, the Park is located in south central Utah in the heart of Garfield County As of January 7th, 2015.... Are you looking for a fun and rewarding way to spend your summer? Then why not apply to work at beautiful Bryce Canyon National Park? The National Park Service is currently recruiting for Visitor Use Assistants (Fee Collectors) for the late-spring-through-early-fall season. Salary is $15.31 per hour, and housing is available in the park.   Click here to learn more about the position and to submit your application:   https://www.usajobs.gov/GetJob/ViewDetails/389260800      Don't delay! The position closes on Tuesday, January 13.
